Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wentworth/24th
ShortDescription: Northbound 24 Wentworth  buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, Canal, Archer and Cermak due to, street blockage near Wentworth/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #24 Wentworth  buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 26th, Canal, Archer and Cermak due to, street blockage near Wentworth/24th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
